name: cagents-marketplace
description: cAgents plugin marketplace - Universal multi-domain agent system with aggressive task decomposition and controller-centric architecture.

plugins.name: cagents
plugins.description: Universal multi-domain agent system with 231 specialized agents across 5 super-domains. V8.0 features: Claude Code hooks system (12 hook types), progressive skill disclosure (SKILL.md), 4-tier model routing (Haiku/Sonnet/Opus), comprehensive security review (20+ patterns), session management with waypoints, metrics infrastructure, evaluation framework, CI/CD scripts, and instinct-based pattern learning. CSV-based task inventory for large-scale workflows (60-80% context savings). Controller-centric question-based delegation architecture with parallel execution up to 50x speedup.
